CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 15, 1959, pg. A1, reads: "Charge People From Other Areas Chief Cause of 3rd Ward's Filth and Stench - Sanitary Problems - Irresponsibility on the part of some residents of the Third Ward and outside visitors, the city refuse department and city health inspectors have allowed unsanitary conditions to arise in some areas of the Third Ward. Left photo shows an ill-kempt dumpster area at Colwell, Pride and Reed Sts., where rubbish and garbage lies outside the dimpster [dumpster], and the door to the container provides an ideal entrance for flies... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Overflowing Dumpster and large pile of debris at intersection of Colwell and Reed Streets, Hill District
